pathAssistantSteps.info: To move to the next stage, please select a Customer Champion for that country and mark the stage as complete.ï»¿

- If the merchant is in onboarding: the Targeted Country will automatically be 'Live' once the Head Of NewBiz validates the onboarding process

- If the merchant is in NMO: ask the Head Of to move directly the Targeted Country to the 'Live' stage

- If the merchant is already in 'Run': now that the stage is 'Ready', a NMO XBorder has been created. Ask the Head Of AM to approve the NMO XBorder, and the Targeted Country will automatically be 'Live'

To move to the next stage, the merchant needs either to have passed the language test or to have signed the Back Care contract:

  • Language test: send the language test to your merchant. Once completed, ask the Customer Champion to review it. If the merchant successfully passed, the CC has to set the field 'Language proficiency test' to 'Validated' in the corresponding Targeted Country.
  • Back Care: get the merchant to sign Back Care contract and tick the box 'Back Care' in the corresponding Targeted Country.

Once one of the two options is completed, you can mark the stage as complete.
